  "abstract_text": [
    "<S> in the present paper , ito formula and tanaka formula for a special kind of symmetric random walk in the complex plane are studied . </S>",
    "<S> the random walk is called _ parisian walk _ , and its _ local time _ is defined to be the number of exit from some regions . </S>"
  ]
}
